About Te Kete Ako

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

🌟 Our Mission

Te Kete Ako exists to support kaiako (teachers) in Aotearoa New Zealand with culturally responsive, high-quality educational resources that honor Te Ao Māori while meeting modern pedagogical standards. We believe every student deserves access to engaging, culturally authentic learning experiences that connect them to their identity and prepare them for the future.

🏛️ Our Vision

To create an educational ecosystem where Te Ao Māori is naturally integrated into all learning, where technology enhances rather than replaces human connection, and where every kaiako has access to resources that inspire, engage, and empower their students to achieve their potential.

🌿 Our Values

🤝 Whakatōhea (Partnership)

Collaborative relationships with educators, communities, and cultural advisors

🌺 Manaakitanga (Care)

Supporting every learner with aroha and respect for their unique journey

⚖️ Tika (Integrity)

Authentic, accurate, and ethically developed educational content

🚀 Auaha (Innovation)

Embracing technology and creative approaches to enhance learning

🧠 What Makes Te Kete Ako Special

🧺

AI-Powered Knowledge Graph

Our GraphRAG system intelligently connects 600+ resources, helping you discover perfect materials for any lesson

📋

NZ Curriculum Aligned

Every resource directly maps to NZ Curriculum Achievement Objectives with clear progression pathways

🏛️

Cultural Authenticity

Developed with cultural advisors to ensure respectful, accurate representation of Te Ao Māori

⚡

Ready-to-Use Materials

Complete unit plans, interactive handouts, and engaging activities designed for immediate classroom use

🤝 Join Our Community

Te Kete Ako is more than a resource platform—it's a community of dedicated educators committed to transforming education in Aotearoa. Join us in this journey.

📧 Get in Touch 🚀 Create Account
